data.title: Extended Learning Opportunities (ELO)
data.text:
Overview of Summer Programs

San Diego Unified School District is excited to announce a variety of summer learning opportunities, so you can create the best summer experience. Enrollment/application information for Academic/ESY and PrimeTime summer will be emailed to Priority 1 families during the week of January 24, 2024. All of our ELO programs will provide the following student to staff ratios: 10:1 for UTK- K; 20:1 for K-8th. Participation in summer programs is not required, however, we encourage families to take advantage of these fun and educational summer enrichment opportunities available only to current San Diego Unified students. The summer learning opportunities are no cost to San Diego Unified families.

Overview of Fall Programs

San Diego Unified School District is excited to announce a variety of fall learning opportunities, so you can create the best fall experience. The window to enroll in Extended School Year (ESY), and PrimeTime is now open. Participation in fall programs is not required, however, we encourage families to take advantage of these fun and educational enrichment opportunities available only to current San Diego Unified students. The learning opportunities are no cost to San Diego Unified families.
